availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Cornelius Hendricks (Fayette County, KY, tollgate keeper)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, tollgate keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Rebecca McKinly Hendricks. Father of Elizabeth Hendricks, Ellen Hendricks, Cornelius Hendricks, Hetty A. Hendricks, Mary Hendricks, Eliza Hendricks, Nancy Hendricks, and James Hendricks. Shoemaker in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Tollgate keeper in Fayette County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 221A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 1, p. 482.
